English:
You're a stubborn one. How many times do I
have to tell you, I don't know any Kamishiro!
Chinese:
你怎麼這麼纏人……
我不是說過好幾次了，我不知道什麼神代企業！
Korean:
너도 끈질긴걸…
카미시로 같은 건 모른다고, 몇 번을 말해야 아는 거야!?
German:
Sie sind vielleicht hartnäckig.
Wie oft muss ich noch sagen, dass ich keine
Kamishiros kenne!

English:
You're asking if I've never heard of them?
The first I heard of them was from you.
Chinese:
你問我連聽都沒聽過嗎？
那當然，我是聽你說才知道的……
Korean:
…들어 본 적도 없냐고?
물론, 너에게 들은 게 처음…
German:
Ob ich noch nie von denen gehört habe?
Erst, als Sie sie erwähnt haben.

English: No, it was before that... On the news, I think?
Chinese: 等等……好像之前……新聞上也有……？
Korean: …아니… 그 전에…… 뉴스 같은 데에, 서……?
German:
Nein, es war doch vorher ... In den Nachrichten,
glaube ich.

English:
Wait, no.
Maybe... I heard it from... my daughter?
Chinese:
不、不對……
說不定……是從我女兒那裡……聽來的。
German:
Nein, Moment, das auch nicht.
Über meine Tochter vielleicht?

English:
I don't know. Ask my daughter... Ask Chika.
I... need to lie down... I suddenly feel dizzy...
Chinese:
我不知道……你去問我女兒……千夏……
我要去休息了……突然間頭好暈……
Korean:
모르겠어… 딸에게…… 치카에게 물어봐 줘……
난… 이만 쉬겠어… 갑자기, 현기증이 나서……
German:
Ich weiß es nicht. Fragen Sie meine Tochter.
Fragen Sie Chika. Ich muss mich hinlegen ...
Mir ist plötzlich schwindelig ...

English:
Chika?
She said she was going to Shibuya, I believe.
Chinese:
千夏嗎……？
我記得她說她要去涉谷。
German:
Chika?
Sie wollte, glaube ich, nach Shibuya.

English:
A new single from a band was going to be available
for a limited time at Tower Records.
Chinese:
好像說有某個樂團的新歌，
會在涉谷唱片獨家發行。
EnglishCensored:
A new single from a band was going to be available
for a limited time at Shibuya Records.
Korean:
시부야 레코드 한정으로
어쩌구 하는 밴드의 신곡이
공개되는 모양이라서
German:
Bei Shibuya Records gibt es für begrenzte Zeit die
neue Single einer Band.

Chinese:
「吉米肯」？
不對，我記得不是這個名字。
German:
Jimiken?
Nein, das war es nicht.

English:
Let's go to Tower Records in Shibuya to talk to
Yamashina's daughter, Chika!
Chinese:
我去「涉谷的涉谷唱片」，
找山科誠的女兒千夏問問看好了！
EnglishCensored:
Let's go to Shibuya Records in Shibuya to talk to
Yamashina's daughter, Chika!
Korean:
야마시나 마코토의 딸, 치카에게 이야기를 들으러
「시부야의 시부야 레코드」로 가보자!
German:
Auf zu Shibuya Records in Shibuya, um mit
Yamashinas Tochter Chika zu reden!
